== Anjur (CT) (627828) ==

Anjur (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.36 sq. km. and harbouring 2654 households with total population of 10860 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 310 km. Male population is 5232 and female population is 5628. Scheduled Caste population is 962 and Scheduled Tribes population is 7. Census Location Code of the town is 627828<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 8 km.
